div.div:
Pete - May 27, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 2.6
Cool!
I have live dmesg and live logcat both installed on my Motorola Photon, and they work great. I have no idea what 99.999999% of the info they show means, but hey it keeps me distracted while my phone boots! Two points subtracted for having an author that ignores emails.

Jonathan - March 7, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 2.6
G2x
Does not work on g2x. Running latest faux kernel with hells latest pics. Just a quick heads up before you buy.

Keith - February 20, 2012 - Version 2.6
Worked on TF101
Great app, however it's not working on ICS for Transformer Prime. It did work on my original transformer TF101 so I'm giving it 5 stars, I just hope the dev updates it to work on ICS as I've bought both his apps. I want to see how quick this moves on my Prime compared to tf101 :)

Flax - January 10, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 2.6
Still awesome
No longer working on my HTC Desire running beta CM9 (black screen same as others) . Still a 5 star app hope there is a fix soon.

Dana - January 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.6
10/10
Perfection for the Galaxy Nexus. A lock screen like this would be worth your time also!

Jason - March 6, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 2.6
Doesn't work on ICS (TF101)
Worked great on Honeycomb. No longer works on my ASUS TF101 since updating to ICS. On boot the screen is blank.

Sebastian - March 21, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 2.6
Doesn't work on ics
As the title says, I'll rate it max as it's still a great app for GB ROMS, am in AOKP 28

William - May 9, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 2.6
Nexus s 4g aokp
Confirmed working on nexus s 4g aokp m5. No touch support though if you want both set it to split screen. Awesome work!

Dan - December 24, 2011 - Version 2.6
Awesome!
But unfortunately all the devs for the AT&T GSII have screwed us with that crap ICS boot-animation! this app no longer works:(

Tim - March 8, 2012 - Version 2.6
Htc evo 4g running cm7.1
App works great. Had the lite version for awhile and just decided to spice it up with the full version to support the dev. Great work!

LJ - March 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.6
Have a beer on me :)
Excellent! Would love to be able to select font size (numerical) and font family with a preview in settings.

Chrisp - April 25, 2012 - HTC One X with version 2.6
Not quite there yet.
Doesn't work with the One X yet. Clearly because we don't have s-off yet. Keeping it tho because 1. You deserve the beer and 2. S-off is just around the corner. Nice work as always pal.

Peter - January 29, 2012 - Version 2.6
Stonefisher
Works great on the ZTE Skate/Orange Monte Carlo. You've earned your beer.

Damian - January 8, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.6
Cool
It does what it says and I've never had a problem with it.

James - April 9, 2012 - Version 2.6
Works great
How about an option to change text colors and add .ogg's?

serban - February 21, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.6
Superb
The best geeky tool ever... You deserve a ton of beers :d

rZn - January 5, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 2.6
No ICS - XOOM
Does not work on xoom EOS ICS nightly, did work on HC

REGGIE - February 15, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.6
Big reg
Love app awesome

Jared - May 11, 2012 - HTC One X with version 2.6
Att one x rooted
Works great on tat one x that is rooted with out s-off. Thanks for great work.

Reginald - June 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.6
Just to show my gratitude for your contribution
Bought app as a form of donation for your great contribution in XDA community, thanks to you I love my SGS2 more, possibly SGS3/Nexus in the future

Pav - May 11, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 2.6
Great bootscreen 5 stars
This app still works.Samsung Infuse 4G

Steve - January 27, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.6
Very nice!
Looks awesome and is very usefull

Saud - December 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.5
.
Was working properly but after the last update I just get a black screen.. Galaxy s2.

Matthew - September 21, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 2.3
Very cool and geeky!! :)
It seems to be working just fine on my Droid X2. Figured I'd mention that since I don't see it as a listed device. Thanks for the cool app, enjoy your cold beverage! :)

Cole - April 18, 2012 - Motorola Droid Pro with version 2.3
Problems after latest update for Droid Pro
After Verizon's latest update 4.7.3, having either live dmesg or logcat installed causes the camera to no longer show a preview on the screen, or any video applications to play back video. The camera still takes pictures and the youtube app still streams audio. Tried a factory data reset and unfortunately this app causes these side-effects on the Droid Pro. The app itself works great and is very cool, but i have to uninstall for now. Thanks for a nice replacement for the bootup animation!

Sunblood - August 12, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.3
Very cool but settings don't save
Droid X CM7. I have both paid bootanimations and can tap to change the display between the three settings but the defaults I set in the app don't show

John - July 30, 2011 - Version 2.3
Works great on G2/Vision
Great app, works perfectly on my G2. Unfortunately, it is unreadable on my new sensation (540 x 960): text appears broken and flickers like an off-sync CRT screen.

Mike - September 12, 2011 - LGE Bryce with version 2.3
Looks cool
Aww wish this worked on LG Revolution ='( running 2.2.2btw

williambusa - August 18, 2011 - Version 2.3
Works great on the Toshiba Thrive
Very nice app. Works well on my Tegra-2 Toshiba Thrive.

josh - September 16, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 2.3
Awesome!!
I love it, Droid Incredible 2.

leon_funnell - September 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.3
Bought dmsg & logcat and also nomoarpowah on sgs2 with Lite'ning Rom V5.0 XXKG6. ...
Bought dmsg & logcat and also nomoarpowah on sgs2 with Lite'ning Rom V5.0 XXKG6. Blank on boot. 100% from system process and hot. Uninstall cured.

Steven - June 24, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 2.3
Pretty neat
Works on my Droid X2 along with live dmesg.

Dave - November 21, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 2.3
Very cool
Works on Droid Charge.

Boo Raddley - July 22, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 2.3
Nerdgasm!
I got both the dmesg and this and I'll never need another custom boot animation ever again.

strvmarv - July 9, 2011 - Dell Streak with version 2.2
Worth every penny, even supports my landscape oriented streak

jason - July 30, 2011 - Samsung Europa with version 2.2
Can I plz get better support for gt i5500 works but buggy plz update ...
Can I plz get better support for gt i5500 works but buggy plz update for this device as firmware update is released and it rocks thx dev

gyrra - June 16, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 2.2
Works on Nexus S 4G! This is perfect, makes my android more like my ...
Works on Nexus S 4G! This is perfect, makes my android more like my laptop.

Tarek - June 17, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.2
A must have with live dmesg the split screen option is so cool.

DeHann - June 7, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.2
Better than the stock boot screen. Maybe create a feature to export to a ...
Better than the stock boot screen. Maybe create a feature to export to a file for review and a guide to decode it? Great work on all apps!

amigacli - June 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.9
Excellent on SGS stock ROM 2.2

Martin - June 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.8
Works great on DesireHD running gingerbread 2.3.4 (miui 1.5.27)

EvilGold - June 4, 2011 - Motorola Citrus with version 1.7
Works great on mytouch 3G (with s-off) and OG droid. Has a small issue ...
Works great on mytouch 3G (with s-off) and OG droid. Has a small issue booting on the LG Citrus (verizon logo flashes behind log). Thank you dev!

StompySan - June 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.7
Works great on Nook Color with latest CM7 nightly.

Rudy - May 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.7
Very nice app, works perfectly! Love to see the log! Samsung Captivate 2.2 (Stock, ...
Very nice app, works perfectly! Love to see the log! Samsung Captivate 2.2 (Stock, rooted)

Alycia - June 17, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.7
VERY cool. Too bad there aren't more customize options.

Zerf - May 18, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.6
Works perfect on my nook color running CM7!

Jason - May 5, 2011 - Motorola XOOM with version 1.6
Blank screen for hot reboots on og droid cm7.0.2. normal reboots show the ...
Blank screen for hot reboots on og droid cm7.0.2. normal reboots show the animation. other boot animations work with hot reboots.

Sonal - April 29, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.6
Excellent app. May I suggest adding just a black screen with "Android" in the ...
Excellent app. May I suggest adding just a black screen with "Android" in the center as option (tap/drag/button).Will help to save some battery points

Dimon - May 17, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.6
Works great on Nook Color running CM7

Brent - April 27, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.6
SU kept FCing after initial install. Works fine after reboot. Droid 1 rooted stock ...
SU kept FCing after initial install. Works fine after reboot. Droid 1 rooted stock 2.2.2 w/ SU 2.3.1-ef --- good app!

Stubobnwayo, SKAB, Tripod...lol - April 27, 2011 - Version 1.6
In the words of Vader...Very Impressive.

Robert - May 6, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.6
Doesn't work on G2X. Took too long for refund. Will re-rate when G2X support ...
Doesn't work on G2X. Took too long for refund. Will re-rate when G2X support is added.

overground - May 5, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.6
Doesn't work on G2x (stock, rooted), but at least it got rid of the ...
Doesn't work on G2x (stock, rooted), but at least it got rid of the annoying stock boot animation.

Mark - April 24, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.5
Works great on a Droidx running 2.3

steve - April 20, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.5
Awesome, and now we have a live logcat. Great job Chainfire!

Mark - April 27, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.5
runs perfect on HTC Inspire (cm7)

Jason - April 20, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.5
Must have!
